com.google.maps.android.clustering.algo

Interface ScreenBasedAlgorithm<T extends ClusterItem>

  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Superinterfaces:
    Algorithm<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NonHierarchicalViewBasedAlgorithm, ScreenBasedAlgorithmAdapter

    public interface ScreenBasedAlgorithm<T extends ClusterItem>
extends Algorithm<T>
    This algorithm uses map position for clustering, and should be reclustered on map movement
